atk-abh03a18:2_3: catunnaṁ satipaṭṭhānānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṁ pajānāmī”tiādīni
atk-abh03a18:2_8: Tathāgatabalañca nāmetaṁ sāvakehi sādhāraṇampi atthi asādhāraṇampi sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇampi.
atk-abh03a18:2_16: Ayaṁ pana avisesena sabbampi sādhāraṇanti āha.
atk-abh03a18:2_17: Tamenaṁ tato vivecetuṁ tathāgatabalaṁ sāvakabalanti puna anuyogo āraddho.
atk-abh03a18:2_18: Tattha paṭhamapañhe niddesato sabbākāravisayataṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a18:2_21: Pubbayogo ca pubbacariyā ca atthato ekaṁ,
atk-abh03a18:3_0: Indriyaparopariyattipañhe ekadesena sādhāraṇataṁ sandhāya sāvakavisaye paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a18:4_1: Idāni yasmā uddesato ṭhānāṭṭhānādīni sāvako jānāti,
atk-abh03a18:4_2: tasmā sāvakassa tathā jānanaṁ pakāsetvā tena jānanamattasāmaññena tesaṁ sāvakasādhāraṇattaṁ patiṭṭhāpetuṁ
atk-abh03a18:4_4: Tattha indriyaparopariyattiñāṇaṁ channaṁ asādhāraṇañāṇānaṁ aññataranti na gahitaṁ.
atk-abh03a18:4_5: Āsavakkhayena vā āsavakkhayanti yaṁ tathāgatassa āsavakkhayena saddhiṁ sāvakassa āsavakkhayaṁ paṭicca vattabbaṁ siyā nānākaraṇaṁ,
atk-abh03a18:4_7: Vimuttiyā vā vimuttinti padepi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a18:5_1: Idāni yaṁ sakavādinā “āsavānaṁ khaye ñāṇaṁ sādhāraṇa”nti anuññātaṁ,
atk-abh03a18:5_2: tena saddhiṁ saṁsanditvā sesānampi sādhāraṇabhāvaṁ pucchituṁ puna āsavānaṁ khayetiādayo paravādipañhāva honti.
atk-abh03a18:5_3: Tesaṁ vissajjane sakavādinā āsavakkhaye visesābhāvena taṁ ñāṇaṁ sādhāraṇanti anuññātaṁ.
atk-abh03a18:5_5: Puna ṭhānāṭṭhānādīnaṁ āsavakkhayeneva saddhiṁ saṁsanditvā asādhāraṇapucchā paravādisseva.
atk-abh03a18:5_8: Tato indriyaparopariyattena saddhiṁ saṁsanditvā asādhāraṇapucchā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a18:5_12: Tato ṭhānāṭṭhānādīhi saddhiṁ saṁsanditvā indriyaparopariyattassa sādhāraṇapucchā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a18:8_3: atha kho purimānipi nava balāni ariyāni”cceva laddhi,
atk-abh03a18:8_8: maggādīsu tena aññatarena bhavitabbanti maggādivasena pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a18:9_3: Sattasuññatā nāma diṭṭhiyā parikappitena sattena suññā pañcakkhandhā.
atk-abh03a18:9_4: Saṅkhārasuññatā nāma sabbasaṅkhārehi suññaṁ vivittaṁ nissaṭaṁ nibbānaṁ.
atk-abh03a18:9_7: Manasi karotīti puṭṭhopi nibbānameva sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a18:9_10: suññatamanasikāro nibbānārammaṇo”ti imaṁ nayaṁ gahetvā “dvinnaṁ phassānaṁ dvinnaṁ cittānaṁ samodhānaṁ hotī”ti puṭṭho lesokāsaṁ alabhanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a18:9_14: Ekadhammasmimpi āropetvā ṭhapetabbasaṅkhātena ca paṇidahitabbaṭṭhena paṇihitasaṅkhaṁ gatena sattapaṇidhinā appaṇihitā khandhā.
atk-abh03a18:9_15: Taṇhāpaṇidhinā taṇhāya vā ārammaṇabhūtena sabbasaṅkhārapaṇidhinā appaṇihitaṁ nibbānaṁ.
atk-abh03a18:9_16: Tasmā idhāpi paṭikkhepo ca paṭiññā ca purimanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-abh03a18:10_1: Tato “yathā satipaṭṭhānādayo lokuttaradhammā ariyā ceva suññatādiārammaṇā ca,
atk-abh03a18:10_2: kiṁ te evaṁ ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇa”nti anulomapaṭilomapucchā honti.
atk-abh03a18:10_3: Tattha sabbāpi paṭiññā sabbe ca paṭikkhepā paravādisseva.
atk-abh03a18:10_5: Pāḷiyaṁ pana sesāni saṅkhipitvā avasāne cutūpapātañāṇameva vibhattaṁ.
atk-abh03a18:10_6: Tato paraṁ sakasamayepi “ariya”nti siddhena āsavānaṁ khayañāṇena saddhiṁ saṁsanditvā sesañāṇānaṁ anulomato ca paṭilomato ca ariyabhāvapucchā honti.
atk-abh03a18:10_10: Pāḷiyaṁ panettha paṭhamanavamāneva dassetvā satta ñāṇāni saṅkhittānīti.
atk-abh03a18:13_3: Yathā pana malīnaṁ vatthaṁ dhoviyamānaṁ malā vimuccati,
atk-abh03a18:13_4: evaṁ sarāgaṁ cittaṁ rāgato vimuccatī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a18:13_8: Tato rāgasahagatantiādinā nayena puṭṭho maggakkhaṇe cittaṁ vimuccati nāma.
atk-abh03a18:13_9: Tadā ca evarūpaṁ cittaṁ natthīti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a18:14_0: Saphassantiādinā nayena puṭṭhopi yathā phasso ca cittañca ubho rāgato vimuccanti,
atk-abh03a18:17_3: maggakkhaṇe samucchedavimuttiyā vimuccamānaṁ nāma hotī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a18:17_4: te sandhāya vimuttaṁ vimuccamānanti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a18:18_3: ekadesena vā ekadese vā avimuttaṁ hoti kiṁ evaṁ ekadesaṁ vimuttaṁ,
atk-abh03a18:18_7: Yathā hi kariyamānā kaṭādayo vippakatattā ekadesena katā ekadesena akatā honti,
atk-abh03a18:18_8: tathā idampi ekadesaṁ vimuttaṁ ekadesaṁ avimuttanti āpajjati.
atk-abh03a18:18_9: Tato paravādī kaṭādīnaṁ viya cittassa ekadesābhāvā paṭhamapañhe paṭikkhipitvā dutiye vimuccamānassa apariniṭṭhitavimuttitāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a18:18_11: Na hi taṁ tadā samucchedavimuttiyā vimuccamānaṁ.
atk-abh03a18:18_13: Tañhi tadā samucchedavimuttiyā vimuttekadesena vimuccamānantissa laddhi.
atk-abh03a18:18_14: Tato sakavādī “yadi te ekameva cittaṁ ekadesaṁ vimuttaṁ ekadesaṁ avimuttaṁ,
atk-abh03a18:18_15: evaṁ sante yo ekeneva cittena sotāpanno hoti,
atk-abh03a18:18_17: ekadesaṁ na sotāpanno āpajjatī”ti codanatthaṁ ekadesaṁ sotāpannotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a18:19_0: Uppādakkhaṇapañhe yadi ekameva cittaṁ vimuttañca vimuccamānañca,
atk-abh03a18:19_1: ekasmiṁ khaṇe vimuttaṁ ekasmiṁ vimuccamānaṁ āpajjati.
atk-abh03a18:20_4: Tasmā yaṁ tassa yogino evaṁ jānato evaṁ passato etehi āsavehi cittaṁ vimuccati,
atk-abh03a18:20_8: yadi te vimuccatīti vacanato vimuttaṁ vimuccamānaṁ,
atk-abh03a18:21_1: kiṁ evaṁ vippakatarāgāditāya rajjamānādīnipi atthī”ti codanatthaṁ puna atthi cittantiādi āraddhaṁ.
atk-abh03a18:21_2: Paravādināpi tathārūpaṁ cittaṁ apassantena sabbaṁ paṭikkhittaṁ.
atk-abh03a18:21_4: tatiyā natthī”ti anubodhento nanu rattañceva arattañcātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a18:21_7: rāgasampayuttaṁ cittaṁ rattaṁ vippayuttaṁ arattanti dveva koṭiyo,
atk-abh03a18:21_11: Vimuttipakkhepi dveyeva koṭiyo dassetuṁ hañci rattañcevātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a18:21_17: Vimuccamānaṁ nāmāti paramatthato tatiyā koṭi natthīti.
atk-abh03a18:24_2: Tattha yesaṁ anulomagotrabhumaggakkhaṇe kilesānaṁ samudācārābhāvato aṭṭhamakassa sotāpattimaggaṭṭhapuggalassa dve pariyuṭṭhānā pahīnāti laddhi,
atk-abh03a18:24_5: maggakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya diṭṭhiyā anuppattiṁ sandhāya paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a18:24_6: Tato yasmā diṭṭhi nāmesā sotāpannasseva pahīnā,
atk-abh03a18:24_8: tasmā aṭṭhamako puggalo sotāpannoti anuyogo sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a18:24_10: Anusayapañhe pariyuṭṭhānato añño anusayoti tesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a18:29_2: Tattha yesaṁ “aṭṭhamako maggakkhaṇe indriyāni paṭilabhati nāma,
atk-abh03a18:29_5: te sandhāya natthi saddhindriyanti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a18:29_7: Natthi saddhāti puṭṭho pana saddhindriyato saddhāya nānattaṁ sallakkhetvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a18:29_12: tassa atthi saddhindriyādīnipīti dīpanatthaṁ atthi mano atthi manindriyantiādi āraddhaṁ.
atk-abh03a18:32_2: Tattha yesaṁ catutthajjhānadhammūpatthaddhaṁ maṁsacakkhumeva dibbacakkhu nāma hotīti laddhi,
atk-abh03a18:33_1: dibbacakkhu maṁsacakkhū”ti puṭṭho taṁ mattameva taṁ na hotīti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a18:34_4: na tādisaṁ itarassāti evametesaṁ ānubhāvagocarā asadisā.
atk-abh03a18:35_0: Upādiṇṇaṁ hutvā anupādiṇṇaṁ hotīti puṭṭho yasmā maṁsacakkhu upādiṇṇaṁ,
atk-abh03a18:35_5: maggo dibbassa cakkhuno”ti vacanaṁ nissāya maṁsacakkhupaccayā dibbacakkhu uppajjati,
atk-abh03a18:35_6: tañca rūpāvacarikānaṁ catunnaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ pasādoti icchati,
atk-abh03a18:35_8: Kāmāvacaraṁ hutvāti puṭṭhopi yasmā na maṁsacakkhumeva dibbacakkhūti icchati,
atk-abh03a18:35_10: Dutiyaṁ puṭṭho rūpāvacarajjhānapaccayena uppannattā rūpāvacaraṁ nāma jātanti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a18:36_0: Rūpāvacaraṁ hutvā arūpāvacaranti puṭṭhopi tato paraṁ bhāvanāya arūpāvacarakkhaṇe rūpāvacaracittassa abhāvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a18:36_1: Dutiyaṁ puṭṭho arūpāvacarikānaṁ catunnaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ pasādo hutvā uppajjatīti laddhiyā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a18:37_2: Dveva cakkhūnīti puṭṭho kiñcāpi dibbacakkhuno dhammupatthaddhassa paññācakkhubhāvaṁ na icchati,
atk-abh03a18:37_4: Puna puṭṭho maṁsacakkhu dhammupatthaddhaṁ dibbacakkhu hotīti laddhivasena paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a18:40_2: Tattha ekaṁyeva sotanti puṭṭho dvinnaṁ atthitāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a18:40_3: Puna puṭṭho yasmā tadeva dhammupatthaddhaṁ dibbasotaṁ nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a18:43_3: yathākammūpage satte pajānātī”ti suttaṁ ayoniso gahetvā yathākammūpagatañāṇameva dibbacakkhunti laddhi,
atk-abh03a18:43_6: Puna yathākammūpagatañca manasi karotīti puṭṭho ekacittassa ārammaṇadvayābhāvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a18:43_8: Puna lesokāsaṁ adatvā dvinnaṁ phassānanti puṭṭho paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a18:44_0: 378.Āyasmāsāriputto yathākammūpagataṁ ñāṇaṁ jānātīti idaṁ sakavādī yasmā thero appicchatāya abhiññāñāṇāni na vaḷañjetīti ekacce na jānanti,
atk-abh03a18:44_2: tasmā taṁ “dibbacakkhuno alābhī thero”ti maññamānaṁ pucchati.
atk-abh03a18:44_3: Teneva kāraṇena “atthāyasmato sāriputtassa dibbacakkhū”ti parato puṭṭho paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a18:44_6: Idānissa vikkhepaṁ karonto sakavādī nanu āyasmā sāriputtotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a18:44_7: Imañhi gāthaṁ thero vaḷañjanapaṇidhiyā eva abhāvena āha,
atk-abh03a18:44_10: Tasmā tassa laddhiyā therassa yathākammūpagatañāṇameva atthi,
atk-abh03a18:44_12: Tena vuttaṁ “tena hi na vattabbaṁ yathākammūpagatañāṇaṁ dibbacakkhū”ti.
atk-abh03a18:47_2: Tattha yesaṁ tāvatiṁse deve upādāya tatuttari devesu yasmā te pañca verāni na samācaranti,
atk-abh03a18:47_6: Tato yasmā saṁvaro nāma saṁvaritabbe asaṁvare sati hoti,
atk-abh03a18:48_0: Atthi manussesūtiādi saṁvare sati asaṁvarassa asaṁvare ca sati saṁvarassa pavattidassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a18:50_0: Avasāne natthi devesu saṁvarotipañhe pāṇātipātādīni katvā puna tato saṁvarābhāvaṁ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a18:50_5: Evaṁ patiṭṭhitā pana laddhi appatiṭṭhitāva hotīti.
atk-abh03a18:53_2: Tattha yesaṁ “saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇa”nti vacanato vinā viññāṇena paṭisandhi nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a18:53_3: “Saññuppādā ca pana te devā tamhā kāyā cavantī”ti vacanato asaññasattānampi cutipaṭisandhikkhaṇe saññā atthīti laddhi,
atk-abh03a18:53_7: Tato naṁ sakavādī “kiṁ te taṁ ṭhānaṁ saññābhavo”tiādīhi codetuṁ saññābhavo saññāgatītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a18:53_8: Taṁ sabbaṁ tato parañca pāḷinayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-abh03a18:56_2: Tattha yesaṁ “nevasaññānāsaññāyatana”nti vacanato na vattabbaṁ “tasmiṁ bhave saññā atthī”ti laddhi,
